p: Laboratory-scale distillation was as follows: 1.5 L of water added to 2 L steam generator that fed to a 2 L distillation chamber, plant material accurately weighed and added to the distillation chamber, distillation for 1.5 h from pass-over by indirect steam, essential oil separated by a cooled condenser and Florentine flask. Essential oil samples were each filtered and stored at room temperature in a sealed amber glass bottle until analysis.
